original: QTE模式：戰鬥中玩家以手動操作模式進行武將單挑。自動模式：戰鬥中自動進行QTE單挑來判定勝敗。戰場模式：在戰場中一對一戰鬥模式進行武將單挑。
text: QTE mode:  During the battle, players will single out the generals in manual mode. Automatic mode:  Automatic QTE heads-up in battle to determine victory or defeat. Battlefield mode:  One-on-one battle mode in the battlefield for generals.
